T02D2884:226b-1: badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D2884:226b-3: phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2884:226b-4: phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2884:226b-6: bde gshegs kun gyi thugs ngo bo //
T02D2884:226b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D2884:226b-9: bslab pa gsum ldan dge slong ngam //
T02D2884:226b-10: dge tshul dge bsnyen bsnyen gnas pa //
T02D2884:226b-11: bya ba'i rgyud mos de yis bsgrub //
T02D2884:226b-12: gzhan gyis de lta ma yin no //
T02D2884:226b-13: dang por sa phyogs gtsang mar rang nyams dga' ba'i phyogs su /
T02D2884:226b-14: stan bde ba la sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung gis gnas la /
T02D2884:226b-15: dri dang me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mdzes par byas la /
T02D2884:226b-16: mdun du rig sngags kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2884:226b-18: ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pas mchod /
T02D2884:226b-21: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2884:226b-22: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya /
T02D2884:226b-23: de nas sva bh'a ba shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham
T02D2884:226b-24: zhes lan gsum brjod pas thams cad stong par bsam
T02D2884:226b-25: mo // rang sems dag pas bam padma //
T02D2884:226b-26: dkar po 'dab brgyad dbus zla ba //
T02D2884:226b-27: dbus su h'um las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2884:226b-28: lte ba'i dbus su h'um mthing ga / gyur ba bzhi pa rdo rje 'chad //
T02D2884:226b-29: brkyang bskum sems dpa' khros pa ste //
T02D2884:226b-30: mthing ga na ra'i rgyan gyis sbud //
T02D2884:226b-31: 'jigs byed mgo skyes gyen du brdzes //
T02D2884:226b-32: rdo rje dril 'dzin me dpung bzhugs //
T02D2884:226b-33: rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsam //
T02D2884:226b-34: rang snyid zla bar snying po dgod //
T02D2884:226b-35: sngon du bsnyen pa sum 'bum bya //
T02D2884:226b-36: gsang sngags rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad sreg pa dang /
T02D2884:226b-37: thams cad srung bar byed do //
T02D2884:226b-38: 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa la sogs pa la bsnun na 'byer bar byed do //
T02D2884:226b-39: kha ti khas kham phor la bris te sgo la dbyangs na sri'u srung bar byed do //
T02D2884:226b-40: spra tshil la gzugs sor bzhi pa byas la /
T02D2884:226b-41: de'i snying gar dgra'i ming dang sngags sprel nas tsher
T02D2884:226b-42: mas kha la btsugs na phyir rgol ba'i ngag rengs
T02D2884:227a-1: btsugs na khros pa zhi ba dang /
T02D2884:227a-2: gsad pa'i sems kyis gsad par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2884:227a-3: rkang lag gang la btsugs na zha bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2884:227a-4: rtags la btsugs na nus pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2884:227a-5: mi'i rje ngar gyi phur bu'am lcags phur la bsngags te gang la bsnun pa rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2884:227a-6: mi thod la sngags bris la /
T02D2884:227a-7: de'i nang du mi khrag gis bkang ba dur du sbas na rigs rgyud 'chad do //
T02D2884:227a-8: dug blugs te klu yod pa'i gnas su sbas na mdze nad kyis 'dzin to //
T02D2884:227a-9: dgra'i sgor sbas na 'byer bar byed pa dang /
T02D2884:227a-10: zhing dkyil du sbas na zhing la mi skye ba dang /
T02D2884:227a-11: phyugs lhas su sbas na mi 'phel ba dang /
T02D2884:227a-12: chur sbas na chu skems so //
T02D2884:227a-13: skyes bu mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la sngags dang /
T02D2884:227a-14: yul lha'i ming spel la bris nas yul lha'i gnas su sbas la /
T02D2884:227a-15: de'i thog tu phur ba la sngags mang du bzlas la yul lha'i snying gar dam du gdab /
T02D2884:227a-16: de'i steng du tsher ma can gyi shing la gdug pa'i me btang la /
T02D2884:227a-20: khyi dang ma he la sogs pa'i sha khrag bsregs la /
T02D2884:227a-21: lha khyod kyi yul 'dir thog ser pho ba shig
T02D2884:227a-22: / ma phebs na bskal bar mi gtong ngo zhes
T02D2884:227a-23: brjod la / phebs na rdzas rnams 'o mas bkrus la btang /
T02D2884:227a-24: ma phebs na gzhag / las de dag thams cad
T02D2884:227a-25: ni sngags dang ming spel ba'i dbye bas shes par
T02D2884:227a-26: bya'o // gsang sngags ni aom tsanda ma h'a ro sha na che ge mo h'um phat /
T02D2884:227a-27: gzhan yang gong gi gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar ming 'ba' zhig bris la /
T02D2884:227a-28: mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i nang du bcug la /
T02D2884:227a-29: lhung bzed kyi 'og tu mandal byas la gzhag / de nas dge slong dam /
T02D2884:227a-31: dge bsnyen phyag na rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D2884:227a-32: pa sngags bzlas pa po bzhi yan chad kyis dben
T02D2884:227a-33: par nub bco lngar nam gung la sngags brgya rtsa
T02D2884:227a-34: brgyad bzla zhing bskor bar bya /
T02D2884:227a-35: bcu drug pa la bskor bar bzlog la gzugs bsrogs na /
T02D2884:227a-36: ji skad sngags dang spel ba bzhin lo las mi 'da'o //
T02D2884:227a-37: ser ba la sogs pa bzlog pa la 'khor lo la bri ba'am rda la'o //
T02D2884:227a-38: g-yul du 'jug na ral gri la sogs pa'o //
T02D2884:227a-39: nad thams cad la chu dang yungs kar la sogs pa'o //
T02D2884:227b-0: gzhan yang 'di'i @227b yon tan ni brjod par mi nus so //
